idea: The Startup consists of a smartphone app (iOS & Android) which will allow 3 types of users to register and create an account – individual users, businesses and nonprofits. The users will be able to make real time map searches and find other users based on “trait words” that they have set up in their profile sections. Users will be able to make posts and replies to posts, connect with other users, make sales listings, create totems on the map, exchange eCards and eProfiles and perform regular search for other users, posts, listings etc.
name: COMWICK TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Jamsfy is an IT service provider to organisations ranging from ‘start ups’ to ‘market leaders’ with cutting edge expertise in JAMstack Websites & Headless CMS. We are the first Indian company that has automated the whole textile industry manufacturing tracking with the help of software.
Every organisation (IT/Non IT) that aspires to conduct business on a digital platform requires lightning fast, SEO optimized websites and mobile-friendly PWAs with advanced security keeping pace with the technological advancements in the Digital Arena.
Jamsfy builds high performance Websites as well as & highly secure Web applications with the power of JAMstack and Progressive Web Applications(PWAs) which enhances the UX (User Experience)
As a part of our customized solutions, we provide guidance & support in advancing customer’s online journey & winning the right audience on their website by incorporating clockwork-like SEO optimization with class-leading UI Technologies.
name: JAMSFY TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: By enabling and empowering clinics, physicians and hospitals through deep technology, we build the path to convenient, affordable and quality care for the billions. Our product is powered by AI, ML with requisite clinical protocols
name: IG SMART CARE PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
1. To carry on in India or abroad the business to process, treat, lift, handle, search, operate, work, sort, dump, distribute, raise, collect, screen, size, share, make merchantable, buy, sell, deal, import, export, treat, refine, prepare, manipulate, pack, repack, transport, mix, store, win, set, manufacture, trade, break, acquire, develop, exercise, turn to account, survey, produce, prepare, remove, undertake, barter, convert, finish, load, unload, supply or otherwise to deal in all sort of renewable energy products, present and future minerals, processed minerals, metals, substances, goods & materials and to do all incidental acts and things necessary for attainment of these objectives.

2. To carry on business as manufacturers, producers, processors, makers, converters, extruders, shapers, drivers, sizers, re-processors, importers, exporters, traders, buyers, sellers, distributors, retailers, wholesalers, suppliers, intenders, packers, movers, preservers, stockists, merchants, distributors, consignors, jobbers, brokers, commissionaires, or otherwise deal in all forms of renewable energy products like wind, solar, biogas energy or otherwise manufacture products thereof and to manufacture buy, sell, import, export and research in green eco-friendly high-tech products.
name: HARITMAY VENTURES LLP
